remarks: Move existential quantifier in and out of class substitution, with an explicit non-free variable condition and in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
statement:
sbcexfi.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
sbcexfi.2 $e |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> ps ) $.
sbcexfi $p |- ( [. A / x ]. E. y ph <-> E. y ps ) $.
$d x y $.
